channel.title: [PI] Highscores - Adding skills
channel.description:
Hey I'm having problems with adding skills on the highscores. I followed this guide: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,438602.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,438602.0.html[/url] I added it all and everything, compiling & Restarting the server. Then when I relog. It still doesn't save the things on the highscores. Just saying
[code] Overall 2 2,083 302,214,360 Attack 2 99 14,391,160 Defence 2 99 14,391,160 Strength 2 99 14,391,160 Hitpoints 3 99 14,391,160 Ranged 2 99 14,391,160 Prayer 2 99 14,391,160 Magic 2 99 14,391,160 Cooking 2 99 14,391,160 Woodcutting 2 99 14,391,160 Fletching 2 99 14,391,160 Fishing 2 99 14,391,160 Firemaking 2 99 14,391,160 Crafting 2 99 14,391,160 Smithing 2 99 14,391,160 Mining 2 99 14,391,160 Herblore 2 99 14,391,160 Agility 2 99 14,391,160 Thieving 2 99 14,391,160 Slayer 2 99 14,391,160 Farming 2 99 14,391,160 Runecrafting 2 99 14,391,160 Hunter 2 1 0 Construction 1 1 0 Summoning 1 1 0 Dungeoneering 1 1 0[/code]

item.title: [PI] Highscores - Adding skills
item.dc:creator: @matiasmunk matiasmunk
item.description:
@matiasmunk wrote:

Dude I did this ages ago…
It just doesnt save for the new skills I implemented
It saves for any other skills.

THIS IS NOT TO ADVERTISE: go on the highscores site and you’ll see what i mean http://64.186.144.17/personal.php?name=cps

Just a note before you tell me not to advertise, that website only contains the highscores, not any sort of client or webclient!

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Highscores - Adding skills
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

just read the files that it comes with… it isnt that hard are you relaly have to do is copy/paste and put the right skill… :s just read the coding a little

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Highscores - Adding skills
item.dc:creator: @matiasmunk matiasmunk
item.description:
@matiasmunk wrote:

[quote=“emtrescue, post:2, topic:404327”]use a tut that actually works

http://www.rune- server.org/runescape-development/google/tutorials/267952-317-delta-pi-highscores-via-website.html

top is delta do waht it says for mysql than the bottom is pi have fun[/quote]
HAHAHA very funny -.- My highscores arent working, it’s just the new skills such as “Hunting, Construction, Summoning & Dungeoneering” that I just implemented with help from Tomjenn’s guide, that will not save on my highscores.

Read full topic

item.description:

Hey I’m having problems with adding skills on the highscores.
I followed this guide: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,438602.0.html
I added it all and everything, compiling & Restarting the server.
Then when I relog. It still doesn’t save the things on the highscores.
Just saying
